entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 08:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: S 39 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning then becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 5. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
